title: Tristana Bomb E does not stick to top of tower.
body:
Hello I am writing this that in ARAM the Tristana Bombs does not stick to any of the towers I have seen it in two games now.  Just was wondering if you knew about that bug on there. i know it is a little one but just wanted to let you guys know and also seen if any one else has seen it on ARAM as well.

Thanks 
Shackmanpro

replies.body: Hey! Thanks for the report! Digging through our catalog, it looks like this is a known issue that only occurs on ARAM/Twisted Treeline. Lemme poke the bug and see if someone is able to tackle it!
The Howling Abyss is too cold and froze her bottle of glue, so she can't squeeze any out for her E.
